attributes.additional_details: Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic, Current year 13 students have missed large ammounts of teaching and exam practice.  Coursework allows students to complete assesment from home if another lockdown is enforced whilst still allowing students to showcase their talent.
attributes.background: Coursework allows students to still undertake assesment however, they won't be hindered by a lack of teaching and support.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553307
